title: Covid-19 - Illustrations
processP1: For this illustrations, I use Figma as main tool, but I also used an plugin called Blobs to make these organic forms on background of each illustration. Mostly of these forms was just simple geometric forms to compose the illustration, but the man is a big vector drawn with the pen tool.
processP2: For this illustrations, I use Figma as main tool, but I also used an plugin called Blobs to make these organic forms on background of each illustration. Mostly of these forms was just simple geometric forms to compose the illustration, but the man is a big vector drawn with the pen tool.
